original_text: Think carefully about how you live, and about the message that you teach. Continue to teach God's true message. Then God will save not only you, but also those people who listen to you.
korean_text: 네가 네 자신과 가르침을 살펴 이 일을 계속하라 이것을 행함으로 네 자신과 네게 듣는 자를 구원하리라

sentences.original_text: Think carefully about how you live
and about the message that you teach
Continue to teach God's true message
Then God will save not only you
but also those people who listen to you
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 말을 듣는 사람들도 구원하실 것이다
